info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 7:54PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Hudson, eastern Passaic, northeastern Union, southeastern Bergen, Essex, Queens, Richmond, Bronx, Kings and New York (Manhattan) Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 753 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms extending from near Yonkers to Teterboro to Millburn. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newark, Jersey City, Jamaica, Yonkers, Paterson, Elizabeth, Flatbush, Flushing, Passaic, Bayonne, Mott Haven, Hoboken, Bloomfield, East Tremont and Hackensack. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
